snippet: The car company agreed to abide by a no-primates policy advocated by People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals.
lead_paragraph: The car company agreed to abide by a no-primates policy advocated by People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals.

headline.main: Volkswagen to Stop Using Primates in Ads, Withdrawing Teaser for Super Bowl Commercial
